title: Pupils learn ‘Crucial’ life skills (Rochdale Metropolitan Borough Council)
text: ( Source : Rochdale Metropolitan Borough Council ) ​Over 2 thousand schoolchildren from across Rochdale borough are to take part in Crucial Crew 's personal safety workshops throughout the next 4 weeks. Bowlee Park Community School and St
